text: Ra kitabavalaharusita uttama tarika bahekale sastrartha nagara, tara uniharumadhye jo atyacari chan, unako kura arkai cha ra spasta bhanah ‘‘ki hamile yasa kitabamathi imana lyayaum juna hamitira avatarita bhayo ra tyasamathi pani juna timitira avatarita bhayo. Ra hamro timro pujya e'utai ho, ra hami sabai usaiko ajnakari haum.’’
